SELECT u.face AS userFace, u.nickname AS nickname, ic.created_time AS createdTime, ic.content AS content, ic.sepc_name AS specName FROM items_comments AS ic LEFT JOIN users AS u ON ic.user_id = u.id WHERE ic.item_id = #{paramMap.itemId}
AND comment_level = #{paramMap.commentLevel}

SELECT i.id AS itemId, i.item_name AS itemName, ii.url AS imgUrl, tempSpec.price_discount AS price, i.sell_counts AS sellCounts FROM items AS i LEFT JOIN items_img AS ii ON i.id = ii.item_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT item_id,MIN( price_discount ) AS price_discount FROM items_spec GROUP BY item_id) tempSpec ON i.id = tempSpec.item_id WHERE ii.is_main = 1
AND i.item_name LIKE '%${paramMap.keywords}%'
order by
${paramMap.sortField} desc
${paramMap.sortField} asc
